title: Lunchbox Says His Son Is Making Him Look Bad As A Parent + Bobby’s Mailbag: Should I Get My Son A Doll For Christmas + Country Christmas Game: Silent Night Edition
itunes:title: Lunchbox Says His Son Is Making Him Look Bad As A Parent + Bobby’s Mailbag: Should I Get My Son A Doll For Christmas + Country Christmas Game: Silent Night Edition
description:
Lunchbox is upset because his sister keeps sending him videos of her twins that are walking. He says his son is letting him down by not walking at 1 year and a half. A listener has a question about buying her son a doll for Christmas. We play a Christmas game where we guess the country artist singing “Silent Night”.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
